mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account (account_id, account_password, account_email, account_location, account_profile_path, account_questions, account_answer) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{accountPassword}, #{accountEmail}, #{accountLocation}, #{accountProfilePath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountQuestions}, #{accountAnswer} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS result from account WHERE account_id = #{value}
SELECT COUNT(1) AS result from account WHERE account_email = #{value}
mapper.update: update account set account_password = #{password} where account_id = #{accountId}
update account set account_profile_path = #{profile} where account_id = #{accountId}
